name: rate-compare-monorepo
description: Universal rate comparison system for short-term rentals (WordPress plugin + JavaScript snippet)

scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:universal-snippet
scripts.test:wordpress-disabled: echo 'WordPress testing disabled - not building WordPress functionality yet'
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:universal-snippet
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:universal-snippet
scripts.lint:wordpress-disabled: echo 'WordPress linting disabled - not building WordPress functionality yet'
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:shared && npm run lint:fix:universal-snippet
scripts.lint:fix:wordpress-disabled: echo 'WordPress linting disabled - not building WordPress functionality yet'
scripts.dev: npm run dev:shared && npm run dev:universal-snippet
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:universal-snippet
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:shared && npm run typecheck:universal-snippet
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../universal-snippet && npm install
scripts.install:all-with-wordpress-disabled: echo 'WordPress installation disabled - not building WordPress functionality yet'

author: Gideon Abate
